scripts.dev:frontend: concurrently --names "UI,COMM,DOCS" -c "cyan,green,blue" "pnpm --filter @rbee/ui run dev" "pnpm --filter @rbee/commercial run dev" "pnpm --filter @rbee/user-docs run dev"
scripts.build:commercial: pnpm run build:ui && pnpm --filter @rbee/commercial run build
scripts.build:docs: pnpm run build:ui && pnpm --filter @rbee/user-docs run build
scripts.build:frontend: pnpm run build:ui && pnpm --filter @rbee/commercial run build && pnpm --filter @rbee/user-docs run build
